title: HP-45
summary: The HP-45 is the second scientific pocket calculator introduced by Hewlett-Packard, adding to the features of the HP-35. It was introduced in 1973[1] with an MSRP of US$395[2] (equivalent to $2,411 in 2021).[3] Especially noteworthy was its pioneering addition of a shift key that gave other keys alternate functions.
